title: [Gameplay] Bug with Kalista Bind and ArcLight Vel'Koz
body:
First off, I do apologize for not including a screenshot of the exact moment in which i encountered the issue and will describe the issue to the best of my abilities.

I encountered the bug in a bot-game, which ultimately led to the crashing of not only my own game client, but the team's as well.

The error occurred during the final stages of Kalista's [Base skin] binding animation, with me being the Oathsworn. 

To be precise, She had already pulled her dagger from her body, threw it on the ground, and turned to me to accept it. [Arc Light] Vel'Koz performed the death animations, rose up from the ground, and was in the process of "reanimating" from the bind when the game froze in a flurry of light!


Some other Information that might prove useful:
Our team [Red side] 
Crash occurred within the vicinity of our Blue camp
Between 1:15 - 1:30; right after, "Minions have spawned"


{{champion:429}} {{champion:161}}
 Our love cannot be!

The only regret I have is not being able to witness the full Oathsworn animation.
2/10 would crash again

replies.body: {{champion:429}} + {{champion:161}} ; a forbidden love for the ages

Hey WFCxTigerBacon! 

Thanks so much for the report! 

No worries about not having a screenshot, you've left a pretty solid description. We'll take a look and see what's going on!

Thank you for taking time out of your day to take notice of my issue.

Last night I played another bot-game, in attempts to re-create the bug under different circumstances.

This time [Blue team] Kalista bound to me right after the team was released from spawn.

The animation proceeded as normal ;_;
